thread.title: World's First Dream App BUCKiTDREAM Unveils "THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST"
thread.title_full: World's First Dream App BUCKiTDREAM Unveils "THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: World's First Dream App BUCKiTDREAM Unveils "THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST"
text:
BUCKiTDREAM
FEATURES THE MOST INSPIRED DREAM EXPERIENCES GLOBALLY CURATED BY DREAMERS ON THE PLATFORM
Top 3 Ranking Dreams Include: Visiting The Beaches of Bora Bora, Experience Australia - Snorkeling the Great Barrier Reef and Summer Holiday in Santorini, Greece
LOS ANGELES , Sept. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dreams are often defined as a combination of incredible images, ideas, emotions and sensations that happen in the mind during sleep. BUCKiTDREAM , the world's first dream app is helping make those feelings and sensations a reality for millions of global mobile Dreamers.
BUCKiTDREAM, which is currently available for download in the Apple App store , has received 5-star reviews across the board after receiving a soft launch late last year with marketing partner and one of the world's biggest Dreamers Sir Richard Branson . The platform allows Dreamers to create their dreams and share them via their BUCKiTLISTs (aka Bucket List) on their social networks. The Dream App is creating a global Dream Economy and has tools for Dreamers around the world to finally discover thousands of dreams, document them and share their journey and ultimately transact and live those dreams with BUCKiTDREAM merchant partners.
BUCKiTDREAM is unveiling today THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST , real data from the dream app featuring the list of the top 10 most inspired Dream experiences that Dreamers want to visit and items on their BUCKiTLISTs.
This list of Dreamer-curated exciting and beautiful places to visit and things to do can be seen in color via photos in the dream app. The images of the dreams were uploaded by the Dreamers and also liked by thousands of fellow Dreamers and followers from all over the world. The August edition of THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST top 3 dreams include Walking the Beaches of Bora Bora , Experiencing Australia - Snorkeling the Great Barrier Reef and Summer Holiday in Santorini, Greece . Other top dream destinations on the platform in August include A Road trip across America, visiting the Eiffel Tower, and visiting the Great Wall of China .
On BUCKiTDREAM, Dreamers can post at anytime and anywhere. Popular dream topics on BUCKiTDREAM include #Travel, #Entertainment and #Family. Dreamers can check out the Top 100 Dreams posted from around the world and if they are inspired, they can like and share them with their friends. The Huffington Post has dubbed BUCKiTDREAM "a fun, innovative, and remarkably simple new mobile social commerce platform."
Below is THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 DREAMS LIST for the months of August and September:
#1: Walk the beaches of Bora Bora , Tahiti
#2: Experience Australia, Go snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef
#3: Summer Holiday in Santorini, Greece
#4: Road trip across America ( USA )
#5: See The Northern Lights ( Norway )
#6: Visit The Eiffel Tower in Paris , France
#7: Go on an African Safari
#8: Tour The Coliseum in Rome, Italy
#9: Visit the Great Wall of China
#10: Vacation at The Bahamas
BUCKiTDREAM's intuitive interface allows Dreamers to upload their dreams (your own personal "bucket list") -- and literally share them with the world. This includes fellow Dreamers (your friends), as well as merchants, who will proactively be able to offer deals, discounts, package plans, group rates, or any number of perks to help Dreamers reach their dreams. BUCKiTDREAM is coming to Android devices later this year.
BUCKiTDREAM was founded by CEO Tim Carroll , former Global CMO of Village Roadshow. Carroll has assembled a top international team to design and implement BUCKiTDREAM.
"BUCKiTDREAM is the world's first dream app, everyone has a dream and we are thrilled to help stimulate this emerging global Dream Economy," said Tim Carroll , Founder & CEO of BUCKiTDREAM. " THE BUCKiTDREAM TOP 10 LIST of most dreamed about destinations is just a snapshot of the capabilities of this platform."
The new version of the platform includes the following features:
Document your dreams: With "Add a new post"; upload the photos related to your journey of the dream. Share the dreams: Share your BUCKiTDREAM with your friends and family members on social networking sites. Achieve your dreams: Once your dream is completed, use the tap saying "Mark as complete." Discover dreams: browse through experiences of dreams and add them to your customized BUCKiTLIST. Privacy: You can maintain the privacy of your dreams according to your wish. Notifications: Whenever someone comments on your dream or is inspired by it; you will be notified. "BUCKiTDREAM brings together Dreamers all over the world through the publishing and creation of one's own unique dreams -- offering everyone a truly local experience with local connections," said Charles Koh , VP Product.
Dreamers can get the free Download of BUCKiTDREAM from the App Store now and enjoy its features.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/worlds-first-dream-app-buckitdream-unveils-the-buckitdream-top-10-dreams-list-300145274.html
